name: Botch
description:
Botch enjoys using his grappling hook to smash bad guys to bits, but he's about to face his toughest adversary yet.

Use the SPACEBAR to jump and glide, ARROW KEYS to move, and SHIFT to grapple to the target reticule. SMASH enemies by grappling into them from behind or from above (unless they are wearing a helmet).

Attach to walls and ceilings by grappling to them and then pounce on unsuspecting enemies. Defeat all of the enemies in a level to progress to the next stage.

Tilemap licensed from egordorichev.itch.io/adve. Music and sound licensed from various mega packs on Itch and Fanatical.
